publications.title: Culturally Responsive Pedagogy in Rwandan Secondary Education
publications.abstract: This study examines the implementation and effectiveness of culturally responsive pedagogical approaches in Rwandan secondary schools, analyzing teacher practices and student outcomes across diverse socioeconomic contexts.

publications.title: Teacher Professional Development in East Africa: A Systematic Review
publications.abstract: A comprehensive systematic review of teacher professional development programs in East Africa from 2010-2020, identifying effective models and implementation challenges.

publications.title: Digital Literacy Integration in Primary Education: Case Studies from Rwanda
publications.abstract: Investigates the integration of digital literacy in Rwandan primary schools, examining infrastructure, teacher capacity, and student engagement across urban and rural settings.

publications.title: Assessment Reform in Post-Conflict Education Systems
publications.abstract: Analyzes assessment reform initiatives in post-conflict education systems, with particular focus on Rwanda's competency-based assessment framework implementation.

publications.title: Inclusive Education Policy Implementation: A Multi-Stakeholder Analysis
publications.abstract: Examines the implementation of inclusive education policies in Rwanda through analysis of stakeholder perspectives including policymakers, administrators, teachers, and parents.
